bibl.title: The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume XXVII (Nos 2452-2480)

series.title: Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No.

bibl.seg: Turner E.G., John Rea, L. Koenen and José Ma. Fernández Pomar, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Part XXVII (Nos 2452-2480). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 39.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 1962, 8°, xii-224 pp., XII plates.

C.R. par W. Morel, JHS 84 (1964) pp. 184-185. - H. Lloyd-Jones, Gnomon 35 (1963) pp. 433-455. - É. des Places, Orientalia N.S., 33 (1964) p. 325. - Cl. Préaux, ChrEg 37 (1962) No. 74, pp. 382-390. - Ed. Volterra, Iura 14 (1963) pp. 351-359. - H.J. Wolff, ZSav 81 (1964) pp. 345-349.
Turner Rea Koenen Ma Fernandez Pomar
